#BlackMagicCraft #Episode213 #booknook

Thanks to LOOT STUDIOS for sponsoring this video!
Check them out: https://bit.ly/36LJFJm

I made an underdark themed Dungeons & Dragon book nook! It was really fun and looks great in the collection of D&D books.

Some specific items used in this build:
(As an Amazon Associate I earn from qualifying purchases)

LED Lights
